UpDroid Commander

Commander was created with the intent of making robotics development less painful. ROS is powerful but using it can be a hassle. Scattered workspaces, multiple terminals, complex scripts, not to mention a difficult install to begin with.

Commander is a ROS IDE which abstracts out all that nonsense.
